rows.label: qst002801_msg0001
rows.name:
It's a pleasure. You may not know me,
but I certainly know of you.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0002
rows.name:
You're the ones who defeated the
terrible Aeshma, aren't you?

rows.label: qst002801_msg0003
rows.name:
Given your apparent skill, there is
something I would like to ask of you.
Will you hear me out?

rows.label: qst002801_msg0004
rows.name:
I am a member of the
Technological Research Center.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0005
rows.name:
And the object you see beside me
is the remains of a weapon used in a
great war, in an age long past.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0006
rows.name:
I intend to research how it operated
and the functions it served.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0007
rows.name:
With any luck, we can use it as
inspiration to develop modern
weapons for the Superbian army!

rows.label: qst002801_msg0008
rows.name:
There are similar weapons strewn
all across Temperantia.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0009
rows.name:
I would appreciate it if you could
help me to collect them.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0010
rows.name:
I believe there are a large number of
these weapon relics out there, but
four should be plenty for my purposes.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm counting on you to bring me
some excellent research samples!

rows.label: qst002801_msg0101
rows.name:
Beside me is the remains of a weapon
used in a great war in an age long past.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0102
rows.name:
I would like you to retrieve four
others like it.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0103
rows.name:
They're strewn all across Temperantia,
so you'll likely need to hunt high and
low for them!

rows.label: qst002801_msg0201
rows.name:
Ah, I see you have finished collecting
the ancient weapons. Very impressive.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0202
rows.name:
You have my gratitude.
With these, my research should
progress by leaps and bounds!

rows.label: qst002801_msg0203
rows.name:
I'm sorry I had to bother you all
with such a menial task.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0204
rows.name:
All the soldiers stationed here
are from Division One of the
Second Imperial Guard, you know.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0205
rows.name:
I tried asking them for help, but they
have their hands full guarding Aeshma,
so I was sadly rejected.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0206
rows.name:
So we have a fair bit of research
funds to spare. I'll be sure to pay
you handsomely!

rows.label: qst002801_msg0207
rows.name:
You have tax gold from the Superbian
people to spare?

rows.label: qst002801_msg0208
rows.name: N-no! That's not what I meant at all...

rows.label: qst002801_msg0209
rows.name:
But...perhaps you are right to admonish
me, Special Inquisitor. I should have
more respect for Superbian gold.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0210
rows.name:
It was foolish of me to suggest
wantonly giving away money just
because we have a generous budget.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0211
rows.name:
To demonstrate my repentance, I will
reduce your reward for this task to 0G.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0212
rows.name: I hope that will suffice.

rows.label: qst002801_msg0213
rows.name: V...very good.
